title: Push-to-Talk Control
task: Uses push-to-talk mode to control when ALFRED listens
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to listen only when I activate push-to-talk, so I feel safe and in control.

title: Home-based Health Check-ins Only
task: Prefers health check-ins in her own home over hospital settings
summary: As an older adult, I want health check-ins only at my home and arranged by me, so I feel safe and avoid hospitals.

title: Limit Notifications to Essential Only
task: Feels cautious but somewhat secure with health monitoring
summary: As an older adult I want ALFRED to send almost no notifications unless I ask, so that I do not feel disturbed or overwhelmed.

title: Formal and polite communication only
task: Control when and how to interact with ALFRED
summary: As an older adult, I want all ALFRED conversations and messages to be formal, polite, and always respectful, including those with my family and friends, so I feel safe and comfortable.

title: Control Therapy Participation Autonomy
task: Maintain privacy and autonomy over therapy participation
summary: As an older adult, I want to join therapy sessions only when I ask, so that I keep full control and feel safe about my recovery.

title: Limit Social Notifications
task: Dismisses unsolicited notifications about social activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to block almost all ALFRED notifications, especially about social events, so that I do not feel disturbed or pressured.

title: Control Medication Reminder Activation
summary: As an older adult, I want to enable medication reminders when I say, so I avoid unwanted alerts and keep control.

title: Formal Speech Style Only
task: Uses formal and concise speech when interacting with ALFRED
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to always speak formally and politely, so I feel respected and safe in every conversation.

title: Strict Data Privacy Control
task: Feels uneasy about technology and prefers to keep her privacy intact
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to never share my data with anyone, including medical staff, without my clear permission, so I feel safe and keep my privacy.

title: Curtly Respond to Medication Reminders
task: Responds curtly to medication reminders from ALFRED
summary: As an older adult, I want to respond shortly to medication reminders to keep control and avoid long talks.

title: Disable unsolicited app installations
task: Disables spontaneous voice prompts on ALFRED
summary: As an older adult I want to block all app installations unless I ask, so that I keep full control and feel safe with my device.

title: Control Formality of All Contacts
task: Maintains control over communication and contact preferences
summary: As an older adult, I want all my messages and talks to be formal and polite, so I feel safe and respected.
